name: Ethiopian Origin
description:
Floral and citrus notes.
Perfect for filtered brewing methods.

name: House Blend
description:
Balanced, medium-bodied with chocolate notes.
Ideal for everyday use.

name: Classic Colombian
description:
Sweet with hints of caramel and red fruits.
Versatile and smooth.

name: Intense Roast
description:
Deep, bold flavors with a long finish.
Perfect for espresso.

name: Natural Decaf
description:
Decaffeinated without chemicals, clean and smooth.
Ideal for evening coffee.

name: Special Cold Brew
description:
Beans made for cold brew.
Smooth with cocoa undertones.
